00044 #include <qmessagebox.h>
00045 #include <qlineedit.h>
00046 #include <qlistbox.h>
00047 
00048 #include "midas.h"

00050 #include "Qt_Connect.h"

00052 //*******************************************************************************************************
00066 Qt_Connect::Qt_Connect(cmExperiment *cmExp, QWidget *parent, const char *name,
00067                        bool modal, WFlags fl) : Qt_Connect_Base(parent, name, modal, fl)
00068 {
00069   Qt_Connect::cmExp = cmExp; // links local experiment to the global one
00070   host_lineEdit->setFocus(); // set the focus to the host name field
00071 }
00072 
00073 //*******************************************************************************************************
00077 Qt_Connect::~Qt_Connect()
00078 {
00079 }
00080 
00081 //*******************************************************************************************************
00087 void Qt_Connect::getExpList()
00088 {
00089   cmExp->SetHostName(host_lineEdit->text());        // gets the host name
00090   char exp_name_list[MAX_EXPERIMENT][NAME_LENGTH];  // list of all the available experiments
00091   int  i;
00092 
00093   // try to get list of experiments from host
00094   if (cm_list_experiments((char *)cmExp->GetHostName().ascii(), exp_name_list) != CM_SUCCESS) {
00095     QMessageBox::warning(this, "ERROR", "Could not connect to "+cmExp->GetHostName(),
00096                          QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Cancel);
00097     return;
00098   }
00099 
00100   // generate list of experiments for widget
00101   exp_listBox->clear(); // deletes a perhaps existing list
00102   i=0;
00103   while (strcmp(exp_name_list[i],"")) {
00104     exp_listBox->insertItem(exp_name_list[i],-1); // insert new item at the end of the list
00105     i++;
00106   }
00107   exp_listBox->setFocus();
00108 }
00109 
00110 //*******************************************************************************************************
00116 void Qt_Connect::gotExperiment()
00117 {
00118   cmExp->SetExperimentName(exp_listBox->currentText());
00119   Qt_Connect::done(0);
00120 }
